button/iconPos.description: Position of the icon, valid values are "left", "right", "bottom" and "top".

button/loading.description: Whether the button is in loading state.

button/loadingIcon.description: Icon to display in loading state.

toast/group.description: Unique identifier of a message group.

toast/position.description: Position of the toast in viewport. Other valid values are "top-left", "top-center", "bottom-left", "bottom-center", "bottom-right" and "center".

toast/baseZIndex.description: Base zIndex value to use in layering.

toast/breakpoints.description: Object literal to define widths per screen size.
